Oh la la, it's Le French Festival
Le French Festival and Martell invites you to "Be Curious" and explore everything the beautiful French culture has to offer.
Go beyond borders this month and join Martell, together with 2 great champagnes of France, G.H. Mumm and Perrier-Jouët, on an unforgettable tasting experience that will excite your senses.
Join us for a Cognac & Champagne tasting experience at Mai Bar, Aloft Hotel KL Sentral at 7.30pm, Tues 24th April
Buy tickets <[[https://cognacchampagnetasting-lff18.peatix.com/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
More about Le French Festival <[[https://www.alliancefrancaise.org.my/en/events/le-french-festival/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
Treat your mom this Mother's Day
You're the one who brought us into this world. The woman who protected us from harm, and helped us stand again whenever we fell. Thank you for always being there for us, mother. We love you always.
Martell wishes all mothers a very lovely Mothers' Day!
Spend quality time together with your mother during this heartwarming day with a bottle of Martell. Enjoy RM50 off any bottle of Martell with coupon code MOTHERSDAY
Valid now till 7th May 2018
Buy at The Cask <[[https://thecask.my/shop/?filter_brand=martell&product_orderby=price&product_order=asc&utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
